data.name: Death in sands
data.detailed_description:
Death in sands is a shooter that will make you rush around the arena at breakneck speed!
More than 25 types of firearms, each of which has its own nuances and features, thanks to the many parameters ...
Crowds of skeletons which cannot be destroyed ... Only temporarily destroyed, which is accompanied by a fountain of bones scattering in different directions.
Magical abilities that allow you to slow down time, heal wounds and quickly move around the arena.
A powerful intellect that the undead obey and that seeks to drive the player into a corner from which he will never be able to get out.

Will you challenge the ancient necromancer, his hordes of undead and endless magical power that raises more and more skeletons?

A powerful intellect that the undead obey and that seeks to drive the player into a corner from which he will never be able to get out.

Will you challenge the ancient necromancer, his hordes of undead and endless magical power that raises more and more skeletons?
data.short_description: Death in sands is a shooter that will make you rush around the arena at breakneck speed! More than 25 types of unique firearms. Crowds of skeletons and fountains of bones. Magic abilities that give a tangible advantage. A powerful intellect that the undead obey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz/AMD Phenom II X4 945 3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or equivalent

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
